title: 2025 F1 driver line-up: latest grid changes and contracts
summary: The F1 driver line-up for 2025 was already drastically altered before Red Bull and Alpine changed their squads. Here's your guide to the new-look grid, including the team changes, fresh-faced rookies and contract details for all 20 drivers

qa_pairs.question: Which team is known for having a strong driver line-up that includes multiple championship contenders?
What is one common reason for teams to change their driver line-up in Formula 1?
What term is used to describe a new driver entering Formula 1 for the first time?
